meanings.sent1: The acuate pencil tip made it easy to draw precise lines.

meanings.definition: Having a sharp or pointed edge or tip
meanings.sent1: The acuate blade of the knife sliced through the bread effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The acuate thorns on the cactus plant deterred animals from approaching.
meanings.sent3: The acuate edges of the paper cut his finger when he flipped through the pages too quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her acuate words left a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The acuate icicles hanging from the roof sparkled in the sunlight.
